body_html:
Apparently (according to @kakawait) you can download dataset via archive machine, e.g. https://web.archive.org/web/20160828233817/http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/index.html

You will need to download and copy the files to your training data directory manually.

You will need to download and copy the files to your training data directory manually.
body:
Apparently (according to @kakawait) you can download dataset via archive machine, e.g. https://web.archive.org/web/20160828233817/http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/index.html 

You will need to download and copy the files to your training data directory manually.
